casebody.data:
In re N.A.B. No. 37P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 1, 2005. Duncan B. McCormick, Lillington, for L.B. David Kennedy, Fayetteville, for Cumberland County DSS. Robin Weaver Hurmance, George Simpson, Raleigh, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of February 2005 by Guardian Ad Litem for Extension of Time to File Response to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Guardian Ad Litem (N.A.B.) shall have up to and including the 7th day of February 2005 to file Response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of February 2005."
